name: Sideshow
0:
”Alexa, ask Sideshow to tell me the news.”
”Alexa, ask Sideshow to play the Culture Countdown podcast”
”Alexa, ask Sideshow to play the Then and Now podcast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sideshow
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sideshow is your one-stop destination for up-to-date geek news, entertainment updates, collectibles news, and more! We are dedicated to bringing you daily, ad-free pop culture news and content that is up-to-date and interesting! 
 
There are tons of ways to Let Your Geek SideShow, from pop culture podcasts to daily geek headlines. Just say, “Alexa, tell Sideshow to…”:
 
-Play the news
-Play the Geek Culture Countdown podcast
-Play Then & Now
-Play the latest podcast
 
For even more geek news, visit geeksideshow.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
